data.text: @SheilaIJensen1 @AKiversen @K_G_Andersen Jeg ved ikke om RS normalt hæver dødeligheden mærkbart, men der er ingen tvivl om, at vi i år har overdødelighed pga. covid-19 "i stedet for" en influenza-epidemi. Hvis vi skulle bibeholde tiltag nu pga *overdødelighed*, så skulle vi også tage helt anderledes hånd om influenza...
@K_G_Andersen @SSI_dk why would anywhere be exempt from an Omicron wave?
@ailment73 @K_G_Andersen @SSI_dk @THLorg Mika Salminen on rusoposkinen inkkari (hox. Sanaleikki).
@CBroendsholmA @SSI_dk @K_G_Andersen A renowned international scientist that's sooo fucking smart that they can't properly spell the word cheekiness and possibly the word shocked. GTFOH.

@K_G_Andersen @SSI_dk Today marks two years since the World Health Organization declared the Covid19 outbreak a pandemic. Since then, official reports through the end of 2021 show that 6 million people worldwide have died and
REPUBLICANS WILL BE HELD ACCOUNTABLE for nearly 1 million AMERICANS DEAD!

@K_G_Andersen Today marks two years since the World Health Organization declared the Covid19 outbreak a pandemic. Since then, official reports through the end of 2021 show that 6 million people worldwide have died and
REPUBLICANS WILL BE HELD ACCOUNTABLE for nearly 1 million AMERICANS DEAD!

@uffe1974 @AKiversen @K_G_Andersen ...som for det basale niveau vel stadig mest af alt er påvirket af respiratoriske sygdomme? I betragtning af at vi eks. næsten ingen RS-virus har haft her til vinter og at influenzatallene har været relativt lave til nu, så ville linien vel have været flad, hvis ikke for C-19?

@uffe1974 @AKiversen @K_G_Andersen For nogle aldersgrupper synes der nu at have været relativ høj dødelighed i efteråret 2021, hvis man sammenligner med de seneste år, som vel er de mest relevante når vores middellevealder har været stigende.  
Derudover er der sæsonvariationen.....

@K_G_Andersen @Annuauroora @SSI_dk ...and you were absolutely right of course.
@SSI_dk is unfortunately only allowed to say what they're told it seems... I believe they're no idiots.
